name: Pinky The Monster
description:
CONTROLS
--------------
Left/Right : choose walking direction
Any Button : flip walking direction

GAMEPLAY
------------
Avoid the bombs!

1pt : per avoided bomb
3pt x current wave : per escaped peep

STORY
--------
You find yourself lost and confused in a strange city. Airstrikes are called to 'protect' the city from you! Made for Ludum Dare 33 'You are the Monster'.
